content.description: Some easy opening moves, with bolted protection, lead to the limestone band. To get through the limestone you can bring a #1, #3 or #4 BD Camalot. You may also be able to fiddle in some other sizes. You can get by with just a #3 but the #4 protects a bit higher.
content.protection: Draws (8 I think?) and a #1 or #3 and an optional #4.
content.location: South side of Salamander Rock. Scramble up the gully until you see the bolts.

content.description: South facing crag with a few interesting, moderate routes. It's best feature is that it's halfway between the Fun Ship and Lizard Tail Spire. Currently it just has one route but there should be more coming. If you're on the way to or just leaving the Fun Ship, be sure to check it out.
